availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Diana Enix Moore in Lewis County, Kentucky, in January 1837. Father of Mary Moore, William Moore, John Moore, Dallas Moore, Lucinda Moore, Harriet E. Moore, Eliza E. Moore, and George M. Moore. Farmer in Lewis County in 1850. Farmer in Lewis County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 1, p. 236B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 946.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, Laurel Precinct, pp. 478A-B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lewis County Marriages, Film 000344051.
"Michael Moore (1815-1891)," Find A Grave, Memorial 83015400, accessed November 17, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/83015400.
